rComments: Nice as can be, but not fully engaged in her teaching reponsibilies.

Lei e molto simpatica, divertente ed intelligente. This class is very interesting but fast paced. If you do not study everyday you will not grasp the concepts. But all in all it is a really good class to take if you are serious about learning the language. :]

I took the Intense Italian Class, so it moves really fast, but Teresa made it as clear and fun as possible. I am not a morning person and I had Italian  at 9:30 am so I was not necessarily in a good mood when I got to class. She was so bubbly and energetic that I would actually wake up and enjoy class. My favorite part was singing songs in class!

Teresa is a great! She teaches the accelerated Italian course, originally a Cabrillo teacher.Teaches the class in all Italian, immersion style.This class goes F-A-S-T. Don't take unless youre prepared to REALLY study. I took this class twice, failed the first time,loved it the second time. She's so funny and very helpful in office hours. Good Luck!
